name: Seizure of territories
description:
Welcome to the game in which you have to fight with the enemy. Enemy tanks have surrounded you and are trying to destroy everyone. But you have a tank at your disposal, ready to help expel the enemy. You will have to focus all your strategic skills, anticipate and stay ahead of enemy moves and capture enemy bases.
To control the tank, use the W,A,S,D keys. To shoot, you must press the left mouse button.
To complete the level, you must either destroy all enemies or capture all the bases on the map. If the enemy captures all the points on the map or destroys the tanks of your team, you will lose.

Peculiarities:
- 12 levels of different locations;
- Simple control;
- Nice graphics.
